Headline: Green & Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green & Orange Line trains running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier signal problem near Cermak. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Orange Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier signal problem near Cermak.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between Adams/Wabash and Indiana, and between Roosevelt and 35th/Archer.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
